javalist wrote:

> hi all:
>    I am new user to junit . there is a question confuse me. Whether i 
> must  write testcode for a method without return value. If it is 
> necessary ,how to write ? Thanks you.
> for example:
>    public class Demo1
>    {
>       private String strName;
>       public  void setName(String str)
>       {
>            strName = str;
>       }
>      ......
>    }
> whether i must use junit to test setName function.

Please read the JUnit FAQ, which discusses this in detail. Google "JUnit 
FAQ".

To answer the question "Must I test X?" there are two answers:

1. Test everything that could possibly not work.
2. Test everything that you fear does not work.

Good luck.
